Guinness Pro14

Friday 18th May 2018

Semi-final

  • Glasgow 13 Scarlets 28

Saturday 19th May 2018

Semi-final

  • Leinster 15:15 Munster

Sunday 20th May 2018

Champions Cup Play-off

  • Ulster 15:05 Ospreys

Please note: All times UK. Fixtures are subject to change. The BBC is not responsible for any changes that may be made.
